title: Lost
lyrics:
Turn up that fader
It's like a lightning bolt
We can't be saved
So now I'm listening on my own
Once there was a time when
You had me hypnotized

You realized that

Your fingerprints were on my bones



I kept falling into every lie

Getting pulled right back when I said goodbye, ooh



Oh, I get lost

I get lost

When I'm with you

But at what cost

Oh, at what cost

Do I let you

Do what you do?



Though all the scars are healing

Youâ€™re always biting back

You know the struggle's real

When I lie down then you attack, ooh

Why don't you stop seeing

Through the looking glass

I watch myself sinking

You're the star and I'm the cast



I kept falling into every lie

Getting pulled right back when I said goodbye, ooh



Oh, I get lost

I get lost

When I'm with you

But at what cost

Oh, at what cost

Do I let you

Do what you do?



No, we can't go back the way we came

On that same old track but broken train

Can't keep loving you

I can't keep loving you

I can't love you again



Oh, I get lost

I get lost

When I'm with you

But at what cost

Oh, at what cost

Do I let you

Do what you do?
